Summary: looked up thur tree saw light moving. kept following to see if an airplane. continued a slow-moving line overhead. then it disappeared over a distance.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There was one other sighting in Birmingham on or around April 6th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi live at inntownsuites room 212, back edge of bldg. i always take notice of orion belt,ever since a kid it's always overhead, which is why i saw this light moving in the southwest sky. it was very shinny like a star but moving towards the city of homewood or busy roads ahead. more or less a large dot of brightness slowly crossing the sky overhead & into the neighborhood to the east of me. i was surprised & wished someone was with me. i lost sight it just disappeared as i watched it in the sky. if it had gone further it would have been over a busy area of town, shopping centers, fast food, and major roadways. i have lived at this spot for about 4 years. in the last year or so say 2011 till the present i have been amazed at what i have scened. this area is where the hotel is located kinda in a business zone,other than the night-shift workers at pepsi\mt.dew and barber's diary. i could tell of other incidents but don't remember dates and details as well i listen to coast to coast heard someone say we should report what we are seeing. for some reason i began seeing more than i bargan for.
